alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 29 at 8:54PM CDT until May 02 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM SUNDAY TO 4 AM CDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Carlton and South St. Louis County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Fond du Lac Band. * WHEN...From 4 AM Sunday to 4 AM CDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. A few trees may be uprooted from the combination of very saturated soils and strong wind gusts. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds are expected Sunday night into Monday.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
